t: Amazon.com: Sous Vide Machines, Immersion Circulators, Precision Cooker, with Recipe, Temperature and Time Digital Display Control, 1000W : Home & Kitchen
s: My Vpcok Sous Vide machine worked like a charm. And after I re-read the instructions a couple times I figured out the timer and temp controls. After that it was smooth sailing. One thing I did wrong...I used a pot that was too big and too tall for the cooking machine and ran out of water once. Practice makes perfect, so I better get stared. Thanks Amazon and thank you Vpcok for a nice easy to use piece of kitchenware. I will recommend the brand ...
